metadata.title: CVE-2016-10210 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low
metadata.description:
libyara/lexer.l in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted rulethat is mishandled in the yy_get_next_buffer function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10210` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyara3 - 3.5.0+dfsg-9
yara - 3.5.0+dfsg-9
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: yara package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.0+dfsg-9').
